title: 14 day ban issue continued. Riots support system sweeping under rug. Refuse to see inting.

embed.description: Clip of kimblee_na Playing World of Warcraft - Clipped by kimblee_na

body:
Hey all, here is a video showing how riot is currently ignoring my support request to avoid the fact that I was banned due to an inting player and closing tickets referring to a random ticket that has nothing to do with the game or ban in question. The original evidence was removed from the support ticket, removed from forums, and specialist ran in to say that I faked the videos. Check the full post here. 

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/EZEhTZad-im-officially-done-14-day-ban-for-playing-with-an-inting-ezreal-twitch-clip-included?comment=0003000000000000000000000000000100000000000000000001

replies.body:
Specialists are just normal community members, not staff.

You weren't punished because someine was intinf, you were punished for breaking the rules yourself.

Riot support doesn't have to unban you bevause someone inted; because you still broke rules.

Riot support will NOT tell you if someone you reported via support ticket was punished. The feedback notification in game is unreliable.

The video was removed from your other post because it broke a forum rule.

When did I say specialist were staff? In fact I specifically seperated specialist and moderators for that reason. 

I accepted I was punished for responding to "report ezreal?" and saying yes to report him. I have said in other post that if I am feeling tilted or toxic I will avoid chat and just int the entire time. Nothing happens as long as it does not seem like im inting. Maybe I am just having a bad game.

I never asked riot to tell me if he was punished, where are you getting this? Nor was the feedback notification mentioned. I had my friend add him to flist to see him play games after the fact.

I know why the post was removed, to protect the intentional feeder. Funny how they say you need evidence he was actually inting, but the only evidence you can actually provide is breaking the rules for providing it.

It is a clarity statement. So many people seem to think mods and specialist are Riot Employees. Glad you knew, now someone who didn't but sees your post knows too.

Think something was misunderstood here. You can also turn ally chat off now. Could always voice with a premade.

Again this is more of a clarity thing. Many people seem to go "why was I punished but not them" but assume you always get a notification which isn't true.

What is proof going to do for us? Whether he fed or not doesn't actually matter to the board community. We can't punish them. Unless you want vigilante justice or people trying to add the person and spamming them with chat.

I can't really see the clip details as I typically use my mobile to access the forums. Screenshots of the text would be easier. So long as they didn't contain a name.

To add to this, I did not receive any type of "reviewed and you still broke the rules" I am getting a continuous loop of closed support tickets referencing a random ticket (as seen in the video above) with no answer whatsoever regarding the game or ticket in question. So no I am not receiving anything and not liking the answer, I am receiving no answer at all. (said before you run on here and say "i just dont like the answer" as you do in other post)

No, I did not say you faked the videos.

I said the following:

* There is no way for the boards community to **confirm** the authenticity of the videos.
* One video is not enough information to prove anything, **especially** when it cannot be confirmed authentic.
* There is no amount of public data that can confirm what you're trying to prove **given that Riot has internal, non-public data that we do not have access to**.

Your tickets are being ignored because, as Riot said, **YOU HAVE ALREADY GOTTEN THEIR ANSWER ON THIS ISSUE**. You being dissatisfied with the answer does **NOT** mean that they will change it just because you spam them.

****
To quote multiple other boards users: **GET OVER IT**.

Btw, this is what you said.

Things have been faked before.

Even if you didn't fake it, we have no data on their connection over the game, their keystrokes/mouse movements, other games they played, etc. There is no way for us to see the full picture. Your one data point is nowhere near enough data to "prove" anything.

Not sure what their connection, keystrokes/mouse movements, other games played have ANYTHING TO DO with him intentional feeding. You are grasping at straws like in every other post you get downvoted in.

> You are grasping at straws like in every other post you get downvoted in.

your projection game is awesome

One user said that I was screwed and I should just move on because you people are incompetent. Way to quot that though. One video IS ENOUGH to show what I said in game, show him intentionally feeding, and show what the enemy team was saying. How was this not enough proof?

Nice job chasing me down on every post to cover your ass. Aren't you the one who also insults users when proven wrong? Oh also aren't you the one who said dutch deserve a ban for using their own language because riot does not recognize it as a language....

There was also zero answer given if you actually watched the video. The ticket was closed and referenced to another ticket that had NOTHING TO DO with the game.

> [{quoted}](name=KimbleeNA,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=O01I0Kn3,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2019-09-04T05:10:32.719+0000)
>
 
> Nice job chasing me down on every post to cover your ass. 

Dude, rujitra is active on this subboard on nearly a daily basis - I doubt that they will stalk you, rather just stumble across your thread again.

>Aren't you the one who also insults users when proven wrong? Oh also aren't you the one who said dutch deserve a ban for using their own language because riot does not recognize it as a language....

No need to pring up this stuff when it is not related to your current topic at all. Face their statements like a grown-up person and stop stirring up drama.

> [{quoted}](name=rujitra,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=O01I0Kn3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-09-04T05:06:11.274+0000)
>
> No, I did not say you faked the videos.
> 
> I said the following:
> 
> * There is no way for the boards community to **confirm** the authenticity of the videos.
> * One video is not enough information to prove anything, **especially** when it cannot be confirmed authentic.
> * There is no amount of public data that can confirm what you're trying to prove **given that Riot has internal, non-public data that we do not have access to**.
> 
> Your tickets are being ignored because, as Riot said, **YOU HAVE ALREADY GOTTEN THEIR ANSWER ON THIS ISSUE**. You being dissatisfied with the answer does **NOT** mean that they will change it just because you spam them.
> 
> ****
> To quote multiple other boards users: **GET OVER IT**.

Well in conclusion:
Riot doesn't give a fuck.

"Riot sweeping it under the rug"

How about YOU do some research. The Ezreal in question HAS NOT PLAYED A GAME SINCE THE 0-17 GAME.
They're probably closing the ticket BECAUSE HE GOT PUNISHED, yet you keep spamming them over and over. They do not have to tell you that he got punished.

You will not be unbanned, because the ban was given correctly. Someone else can't make you do something in this video game, you have control over your actions. The inting Ezreal didn't make you try to get a rise out of the enemy zed, you did. You kept spamming "report this, why won't you report" all game, which is against the rules. 1 report in a game = 9 reports in a game, or any number inbetween. 

There are 4 levels of punishments. 10 game chat restriction, 25 game chat restriction, 14 day ban, and perma ban. Each level, the amount of rudeness/negativity required to go to the next is lowered. At this point, you will be banned for one game with any negativity. I advise mute and ignore other players. If someone ints, just ignore it and report at end of game.

However, if you "don't care because you can buy an account for $1" as you said in your other post, well, why are you making such a big deal out of it?
Couldn't this have been added to your existing thread?

A whole new topic with an entirely different video regarding an entirely different issue within the spectrum of the last post is spam...got it. Glad to see you back, I assume you did no research into my post again?

It is hilarious to see the same 5-10 people come on every player behavior forum post and downvote it to hell while saying riot in infallible.

> [{quoted}](name=KimbleeNA,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=O01I0Kn3,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2019-09-04T05:16:42.209+0000)
>
> A whole new topic with an entirely different video regarding an entirely different issue within the spectrum of the last post is spam...got it. Glad to see you back, I assume you did no research into my post again?

"issue continued"

"A whole new topic"

Different evidence provided regarding the support system not the chat logs. Last evidence was removed because "reasons" I believe it was no name shaming of the guy who ruined promo games with no recourse.

If this is spam cant you call your parents at riot and get it removed?

Looking at the date and time that your tickets were submitted in, it's very clear what happened.

You submitted 3 tickets about the same issue in two days. Submitting an additional ticket puts you at the back of the queue.

Yes, they closed your most recent ticket and then they referenced the original ticket number as the place where your issue would be handled.

They have done nothing inappropriate. Wait for your ticket to receive an answer.
